Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
CAN: The student may draw two stick figures representing students, possibly far apart.
The student might show a line connecting the two figures, indicating some connection between them, but it may be unclear.
CANNOT: The student is unlikely to draw the string as a crucial part of the telephone, or it may be missing entirely (student does not yet understand the role of the string in transmitting sound).
There may be no indication that sound travels through the string (student might not know that sound moves along the string).
The student is unlikely to label parts of the device with scientific terms related to sound communication (lacking vocabulary and understanding).
The student may not represent real-world materials accurately (e.g., drawing something other than cups or not showing the materials in detail).
There may be no depiction of the function of sending and receiving sound (lack of understanding of the mechanism).
